title: Busek finds headroom to double in size
summary: Busek is rapidly expanding its staff and facilities in response to strong demand for spacecraft propulsion.

title: Galactic Energy of China registers third consecutive successful launch
summary: Chinese commercial launch service provider Galactic Energy maintained a 100 percent launch record early Tuesday with its third Ceres-1 solid rocket launch.

title: TransAstra and Slooh to offer students asteroid detection tool
summary: Space logistics startup TransAstronautica announced a partnership Aug. 9 with online astronomy platform Slooh to offer U.S. schools access to a global telescope network of ground-based and space-based telescopes.

title: Benchmark unveils small satellite collision-avoidance kit
summary: Benchmark Space Systems unveiled a collision avoidance kit designed to help small satellites dodge debris and steer clear of other spacecraft.

title: Northrop Grumman partners with Firefly and SpaceX to save Antares rocket, launch Cygnus spacecraft
summary: Northrop Grumman has announced plans to partner with startup Firefly Aerospace to save (and upgrade) the conglomerate’s Antares rocket, which it uses...
